comments.body: This doesn't match https://amplitude.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/115002889587#type-definitions is the third parameter intentional?

Indeed it doesn't match the public documentation, but the third parameter is passed in code (in most cases contains some detailed description of an error):

In the following examples, the details.reason is the only way to know which is the reason for the error.

If you think this exposes too much of the internal implementation I can remove it.

https://github.com/amplitude/Amplitude-JavaScript/blob/master/src/amplitude-client.js#L826
https://github.com/amplitude/Amplitude-JavaScript/blob/master/src/amplitude-client.js#L844
https://github.com/amplitude/Amplitude-JavaScript/blob/master/src/amplitude-client.js#L850
